description: A longer Ferrosi short that truly embodies the multi-sport function, we built this short to fit over a bike chamois and look good worn alone for hiking in an updated eco-friendly fabric that is 45% recycled nylon with improved stretch and recovery for multi-day use.
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Overshorts, 12" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved 48% Recycled Nylon, 38% Nylon, 14% Spandex
